title: Ships and Boats
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 169 words, Level H (Grade 1), Lexile 470L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     K and R		                 
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     K and R
description: From a simple canoe to a flashy cruise ship, students learn about all kinds of watercraft in this informative book. The book traces the history and development of boats used for both work and play. Book and lessons also available at Levels K and R.
meta: bark, coasts, frames, goods, motors, oars, paddles, poles, sails
Connect to prior knowledge to understand text
Main Idea and Details : Identify the main idea and supporting details
Long Vowel Sounds : Discriminate medial long vowel /o/ sound
Vowel Digraphs : Identify vowel digraph oa
Alphabetical Order : Place words in alphabetical order

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
